item.title: Todo Collaborative SaaS
item.description: Todo Collaborative SaaS Mission Empower the people to get things done as possible Problem It is hard for people to execute things thoroughly There is not enough practical knowledge for people to execute tasks as efficiently as possible Not utilizing human characteristics for driving action Solution Systematically empower people to execute their tasks as efficient as possible Declare something to get it done and if not, there will be a punishment that is effective of your choice Collaborative environment to spread it through viral marketing
